description: Website where bugs can be reported (e.g., GitHub Issues).
Imported packages (separated by ,[[:space:]]). Versions can be specified inside a parenthesis. For example, ggplot2 (>= 3.2.1), dplyr (>= 0.8.4)
Suggested packages. Same format as Imports.
